uber

Class RouteTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.RouteTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class RouteTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    A Timer class that serves as an Observer to RequestHandler. Determines the time estimate on a route and starts a timer according to this route.
    Author:
    FaithChan

    • Constructor Detail

      • RouteTimer

        public RouteTimer(RequestHandler handler,
                  double speed)
        Constructor. Takes the RequestHandler and the speed/rate at which the vehicle is moving.
        Parameters:
        handler - The RequestHandler being observed.
        speed - The rate at which the vehicle is moving.

    • Method Detail

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer(Driver driver,
                       Customer customer,
                       double timeEstimate)
        Starts a timer to simulate the delay between a request and the completion of the request/route. Signals the handler to begin the rating procedure.
        Parameters:
        driver - The Driver in this request.
        customer - The Customer in this request.
        timeEstimate - The amount of time the route is expected to take.

      • update

        public double update(Driver driver,
                     Customer customer,
                     java.util.LinkedList<Location> route)
        Updates when the Subject signals. Determines and displays the estimated wait time and begins the timer.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer

      • displayWaitTime

        public void displayWaitTime(Driver driver,
                            Location source,
                            double timeEstimate)
        Helper function to provide a status update to the user.
        Parameters:
        driver - The Driver in this request.
        source - The start location of the route.
        timeEstimate - The estimated amount of time the route will take.
